overview:
Steve Hyndman has 25 years of financial, venture capital, and operational experience in Silicon Valley-based technology enterprises. He was previously CFO of Prospero Ventures, a venture capital firm focused on early-stage technology companies, and CFO of the U.S. subsidiary of ASCII Corporation, a Tokyo-based technology and media company making strategic investments throughout North America. Steve also served as CFO of a publicly-traded software company, and held various financial and operating positions.

Steve is a graduate of Santa Clara University, where he earned a B.S. Commerce (cum laude) and Juris Doctor. He also studied international business at the Instituto de Estudios Europeos in Madrid, Spain.

Steve speaks Spanish and French, and just enough Portuguese to get in and out of trouble. He and his wife travel internationally with their two young children nearly every summer and head for the slopes whenever possible during ski season. He plays guitar much less than he used to.
